import "./Form.css"; import React,{useState} from 'react' import { useEffect } from "react"; const TransactonForm = () => { const [details,setDetails]=useState({ transactionDate:"", monthYear:"", transactionType:"", fromAccount:"", toAccount:"", transactionAmount:"", receipt:"", notes:"" }); const getTransactionDetails = ()=>{ const storeData = localStorage.getItem('form'); if(!storeData) return{ transactionDate:"", monthYear:"", transactionType:"", fromAccount:"", toAccount:"", transactionAmount:"", receipt:"", notes:"" } return JSON.stringify(storeData) } useEffect(()=>{ localStorage.setItem('transactionForm',JSON.stringify(details)) },[details]) const hasChange = (e)=>{ const {name,value} = e.target; console.log(name, value) setDetails((prev)=>{ return {...prev,[name]:value} }) } console.log(details) const submitHandler = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(e.target) } return ( <>














); }; export default TransactonForm;
